introduction: SBM Machinery is a specialist manufacturer of Coal beneficiation plant. It supplies a variety crusher equipments and also design complete pair of Coal beneficiation plant in line with the requirements of consumers.
flow:
About Coal Beneficiation, there are three kinds of processes may be performed at the plants:
(1) Sizing, controlled by a crushing and screening process.
(2)Increasing heating value, by removing noncombustible ash and rock by gravity separation.
Removing or controlling undesirable mineral and chemical components by a combination of gravity separation and blending.
